text: 11|91|avar paṟaññu: śu'aibē, nī paṟayunnatil ninn adhikabhāgavuṁ ñaṅṅaḷkk manas'silākunnilla. tīrccayāyuṁ ñaṅṅaḷil balahīnanāyiṭṭāṇ ninne ñaṅṅaḷ kāṇunnat‌. ninṟe kuṭumbaṅṅaḷ illāyirunneṅkil ninne ñaṅṅaḷ eṟiññ keālluka tanne ceyyumāyirunnu. ñaṅṅaḷe sambandhiccēṭattēāḷaṁ nīyeāru pratāpavāneānnumalla
